function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High social activity and high population density contributing to COVID-19 infections","Impact":"Increased spread and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and restricting large gatherings, improving public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, crowd monitoring systems","People":"General public, event organizers, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of spatial econometric models leading to oversight of spatial spillover effects","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of disease transmission dynamics, failure to account for localized outbreaks","Mitigation":"Integrating spatial econometric models to account for spatial spillover effects, analyzing localized outbreaks","Technologies":"Spatial regression models, GIS mapping tools","People":"Epidemiologists, spatial analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to consider socio-economic covariates in spatial analysis","Impact":"Inability to account for disparities in disease spread and impact, oversight of vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Incorporating socio-economic covariates into spatial analysis, addressing disparities in access to healthcare and resources","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
